original_title: Rambla, sin tu amor yo no soy nadie
overview: Morning breaks on a typical traffic jam on Highway 2 where some lost characters -a goth girl, a gypsy and some sort of pastor- walk alongside the road. They walk through sunflower fields, arrive at the Mar del Plata beach, go up the boardwalk and get lost in an open air popular dance hall. There, street artists, dancers and singers have been meeting for more than 30 years.
title: Rambla, sin tu amor yo no soy nadie
